resources.string: Unable to read your access key, paste your access link below to try again.\n\nIf you don't have an access link, see the prompt on your artist page on the
for more details.\n\nIf you don't have an artist page, we may not be aware of your presence at %1$s. Contact %2$s on Discord to get added.
It's also possible that Cloudflare invalidated your session. You can try logging out and logging back in to re-select your Google account.
Outdated initial artist, reload page to try re-merge
Could not save because some fields have errors
Data from a previous year is available, would you like to autofill that as a starting point?
Your submission helps to make %1$s better for everyone
All entries are subject to manual validation and may take several days to be reflected on the public site. For an urgent matter, please contact %1$s on Discord.
Please return closer to con to upload your catalog or add stamp rallies. Here's a reminder 30 days before.
To update your data at any time, open your access link again.
All fields are optional. Non-empty fields are locked by default to avoid accidental edits; click the lock icon to unlock
Table number (i.e. A01), leave blank if not known yet
Describe yourself and your art; can be different from convention submission
Active social media (Bluesky, Instagram, X, etc.)
Portfolio link (ArtStation, Carrd, personal sites, etc. that show art samples)
Anything not captured in another field, should be exceptional
Any clarifications, misc. requests, or comments
Catalog upload will be available closer to con
Display name / theme of the rally
List of tables (A01, KH-1000, SH-3003, WH-5005 format)
Social media post or more info link if one exists
Minimum price (USD) per table (blank, 1, and 0 are also valid)
Description of prize when rally is completed
How many prize packs are available
Anything else the attendee needs to know
